name: Jimmy Dean Sausage Crostini
author: JimmyDean
summary: Toasted rounds of sliced French bread are topped with a mixture of sausage, mozzarella cheese, sweet red peppers and fresh basil.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package Regular Flavor Jimmy Dean Pork Sausage, cooked, crumbled and drained
⅔ cup sweet red pepper, finely chopped
⅓ cup fresh basil, finely chopped
2 (12 ounce) loaves French bread, sliced 3/4 inch thick
4 tablespoons olive oil or melted butter
directions: In large bowl, combine cooked sausage, onion, mozzarella, cream cheese, red pepper, basil, and optional ingredients if desired; mix well
Place sliced bread on baking sheet, brush tops with butter or olive oil and bake until lightly toasted
Remove from oven and top each slice with sausage mixture
Return to oven and bake 7-10 minutes or until topping is hot
